channel.title: ffmpeg on Carson Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ffmpeg on Carson Blog

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Install choco install ffmpeg -y 👉 download by chocolate Usage Commands Description ffmpeg -i result.webm -c copy output.mp4 將webm轉檔成mp4 (會沒有聲音) ffmpeg -i result.webm -c copy -c:a aac output.mp4 將webm轉
